Welcome! I am currently an assistant professor at the department of Business and Management Science at the Norwegian School of Economics (NHH).



Education

r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap", fill = "#6610f2", a11y = "sem") Ph.D. in Finance, 2023

r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap", fill = "#6610f2", a11y = "sem") B.Sc. in Economics and Business Administration, 2016
Norwegian School of Economics
